properties.description: Bulk Load for all tables in source with drop and recreate table option

copySink.preCopyScript:
BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'dbo') EXEC('Create Schema [dbo]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[addresses]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [dbo].[addresses] ([id] int,
[latitude] decimal(16,14),
[longitude] decimal(16,14),
[street] nvarchar(255),
[block] nvarchar(255),
[building] nvarchar(255),
[avenue] nvarchar(255),
[floor] nvarchar(255),
[apartment] nvarchar(255),
[created_at] datetimeoffset(7),
[updated_at] datetimeoffset(7),
[area_id] int,
[person_id] int);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'dbo') EXEC('Create Schema [dbo]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH
